com.ooyala.android.ssai

Class AdModePlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ooyala.android.ssai.AdModePlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.ooyala.android.player.PlayerInterface

    public class AdModePlayer
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.ooyala.android.player.PlayerInterface
    Wrapper for OoyalaPlayer with SSAI behavior when in AdMode
